resources.string: Avoid standing in a light that throws sharp shadows like in sharp sunlight or directly under a lamp.
If you can, take off your glasses.
Avoid standing in front of busy backgrounds.
You have successfully authenticated using your face.
You have successfully provided a live face.
Liveness detection failed. Review tips to successfully run a liveness detection session.
Authentication failed. Review tips to get the best out of face authentication.
Registration failed. Please review tips and try again.
Align your face with the oval

string.name: camera_preview_failed
string.comment: Shown when the app is unable to start the camera or show its preview

string.name: great_hold_it
string.comment: Displayed above the face when the user correctly followed the directions and should stay still

string.name: slowly_turn_to_follow_arror
string.comment: Displayed as an instruction during face detection along with an arrow indicating direction

resources.string: Slowly turn to follow the arrow

string.name: you_may_have_turned_too_far
string.comment: Shown in a dialog as an explanation of why the face session is failing

resources.string: You may have turned too far

string.name: please_wait
string.comment: Displayed above the face when the session is finishing

resources.string: Turn your head in the direction of the arrow
